Condor:

"No exist cure... "said bittery  and dificulty Condor, then he 
opened his com link to Rodimus"Farewell, Rodimus, I just... like to 
give you my last report... Something it's more painful that my 
wounds... the fact that I can't do more... I... couldn't rest in 
peace until she's back, 'cause I have to stopped him... One tip 
more, someone have to play the Flicer's game... to get her back, but 
don't delay... I was prisioner of War... I know what could be the 
place that.. wait her..."

He said his words wiht his last strengh, after that he died.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime/Kup : :
> Rodimus listened and his worst fear dawned on him. The center of 
his world, the femme he loved had been captured. He knew it was 
because Flicker saw how close her and he had been. That's why he 
wanted her. This was Rodimus' fault!
> Rodimus Prime: It's not your fault Condor. You tried to save her. 
That's all I could ask of you. If it's anyones it's my fault.
> Rodimus swung Condor over his shoulder then went to get Kup. Kup 
was just now recovering from the gasses effects.
> Kup: Roddy, I'll get him to a CR. I believe that Elita is in good 
hands. You just go after Flicker. I'll join you soon.
> Rodimus Prime: Ok, Kup, here.
> Rodimus hands Condor over to Kup.
> Kup rushes to the CR room, placing Condor in one.
> Kup: You'll be ok, lad...
> Meanwhile Rodimus had already left the base in car mode, pushing 
his motor over it's limit.
> "I have to get to her," he thought.
> Rodimus opened a comm back to base.
> Rodimus Prime: This is Rodimus Prime. I'm in persuit of Flicker 
and Nightlight. I just want to know who has my daughter right now?
>  airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:Conodr:
> Condor opened his eyes when he heard Rodimus' voice.
> 
> "He is a spy... and caught her... All this mess it's my fault... I 
> lost them after we take the vaccine's shot... " Condor tried to 
> resist more but slowly his life was ending "After that I saw her 
> left the room with the baby and I lost Flicker of my sight... 
After 
> I knew about... him... was when she was her prisioner... when Kup 
> and I arrived here he tied Nightlight's hands and were almost 
ready 
> to lef the base... Nightlight hadn't the baby in her arms, I 
guess.. 
> that she found the way to... save the baby... I only regret that 
my 
> mistake did all this... mess... and now she is in danger... I'm 
> sorry..."
> 
> Condor's life was ending, but the maximal didn't like to die 
before 
> heard Rodimus that he was firgiven and told him some things more
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
> wrote:
> > 
> > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > 
> > Rodimus hadn't recieved a return message from Yggdrasil. Was 
> something wrong?
> > 
> > A few moments later Rodimus pulls into the base. The hull had 
been 
> breached and the power seemed to be out. All of the ships seals 
and 
> shields were open. What had happened?
> > 
> > Rodimus transformes to bot mode and walks into the base a bit. 
> Just then the power comes back on. Rodimus then sees Kup and 
Condor.
> > 
> > Rodimus kneels down at Kup's side.
> > 
> > Rodimus Prime: Hey Kup, you ok old man?
> > 
> > Kup mumbles something that isn't understandable. He is still 
> frozen by the gas. Kup glances his eyes over at Condor.
> > 
> > Rodimus turns, seeing Condor.
> > 
> > Rodimus Prime: Oh Primus...
> > 
> > Rodimus runs over to Condor.
> > 
> > Rodimus Prime: Condor, you ok? What the pit happened here?
> >
